properties.entry: SELECT MEM_ID , ORDER_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , ORDER_QUENTITY , ORDER_DATE , TOTAL_PRICE , DELIVERY_STATUS , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN ORDER_LIST USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE DELIVERY_STATUS = ? AND MEM_ID = ?

SELECT M.MEM_ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BASKET B WHERE M.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) AS BASKET, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO ) AS CONFIRM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO AND ORDER_STATUS = 2 OR DELIVERY_STATUS = '구매취소') AS CANCEL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO AND DELIVERY_STATUS = '상품준비중' AND ORDER_STATUS != 2) AS READY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO AND DELIVERY_STATUS = '배송중') AS TRANSIT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO AND DELIVERY_STATUS = '배송완료') AS DELIVERED FROM MEMBER M WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , SCRAP_COUNT , PR_REVIEW_ENROLLDATE "REVIEW_ENROLLDATE" FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = REVIEW_WRITER) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = ? ORDER BY PR_REVIEW_ENROLLDATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , TOTAL_PRICE , ORDER_DATE , DELIVERY_STATUS , ORDER_STATUS FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN ORDER_LIST USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = ? ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2
SELECT PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT
INSERT INTO DELIVERY ( DEL_NAME , DEL_PHONE , DEL_EMAIL , DEL_ADDRESS , DEL_REQUEST ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT TO_CHAR(BASKET_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" FROM BASKET JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? GROUP BY TO_CHAR(BASKET_DATE, 'YYYY.MM')

SELECT MEM_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_CODE , TO_CHAR(BASKET_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" , BASKET_DATE , AMOUNT , PRICE * AMOUNT "PRICE" , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE FROM BASKET JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND DELIVERY_STATUS = ? GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') ORDER BY MONTH ASC

SELECT OP.ORDER_NO "ORDER_NO" , TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" , ORDER_DATE , ORDER_QUENTITY , ORDER_STATUS , DELIVERY_STATUS , PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_CODE "PRODUCT_CODE" , TOTAL_PRICE + DELIVERY_PRICE "TOTAL_PRICE" , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE FROM ORDER_PRO OP JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN ORDER_LIST OL ON (OP.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (OL.PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND DELIVERY_STATUS = ? ORDER BY ORDER_DATE ASC
SELECT PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , ENROLL_DATE , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE , SALES_UNIT , CAPACITY , PACKING , ALLERGY , EXPIRATION_DATE , IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = ?
UPDATE ORDER_PRO SET ORDER_STATUS = 1 WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
UPDATE ORDER_PRO SET ORDER_STATUS = 2 , DELIVERY_STATUS = '구매취소' WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO , PR_REVIEW_CONTENT , PRODUCT_CODE , REVIEW_WRITER , PR_REVIEW_RATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT REVIEW_NO , PR_REVIEW_CONTENT , MEM_ID , PR_REVIEW_RATE FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER ON (REVIEW_WRITER=MEM_NO) WHERE R.PR_REVIEW_STATUE = 'N' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') ORDER BY MONTH ASC

SELECT OP.ORDER_NO "ORDER_NO" , TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" , ORDER_DATE , ORDER_QUENTITY , ORDER_STATUS , DELIVERY_STATUS , PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_CODE "PRODUCT_CODE" , TOTAL_PRICE + DELIVERY_PRICE "TOTAL_PRICE" , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE FROM ORDER_PRO OP JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN ORDER_LIST OL ON (OP.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (OL.PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = ? ORDER BY ORDER_DATE ASC

INSERT INTO ORDER_PRO ( ORDER_NO , DEL_NAME , DEL_PHONE , DEL_EMAIL , MEMO , DELIVERY_STATUS , DEL_ADDRESS , DEL_ADDRESS_CODE , DEL_ADDRESS_DETAIL , DEL_ADDRESS_REF ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDERNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME , ORDER_QUENTITY , TOTAL_PRICE , DELIVERY_PRICE , DISCOUNT_FEE , TOTAL_PRICE + DELIVERY_PRICE - DISCOUNT_FEE "TOTAL" , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE , DELIVERY_STATUS , DEL_NAME , DEL_PHONE , DEL_EMAIL , DEL_ADDRESS_CODE , DEL_ADDRESS , DEL_ADDRESS_DETAIL , DEL_ADDRESS_REF , MEMO , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN ORDER_LIST USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND ORDER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BASKET ( MEM_NO , PRODUCT_CODE , AMOUNT , BASKET_DATE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_CODE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) as "COUNT" FROM PRODUCT

INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , ENROLL_DATE , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE , SALES_UNIT , CAPACITY , PACKING , ALLERGY , EXPIRATION_DATE , IMG_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
